publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2762 Bill Wilson: All Citizens Equal—That the Parliament notes the recent controversy regarding the right of naturalised citizens to play football for the Scottish national team and affirms its view that all citizens of Scotland are equal and that a naturalised citizen is no less a citizen, and has no fewer rights, than those born in this country.
S3M-2762 All Citizens Equal (lodged on 27 October 2008) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-2762 Bill Wilson: All Citizens Equal—That the Parliament notes the recent controversy regarding the right of naturalised citizens to play football for the Scottish national team and affirms its view that all citizens of Scotland are equal and that a naturalised citizen is no less a citizen, and has no fewer rights, than those born in this country. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*

S3M-2762 Bill Wilson: All Citizens Equal—That the Parliament notes the recent controversy regarding the right of naturalised citizens to play football for the Scottish national team and affirms its view that all citizens of Scotland are equal and that a naturalised citizen is no less a citizen, and has no fewer rights, than those born in this country. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Bob Doris, Stuart McMillan, Ross Finnie*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-2762 All Citizens Equal (lodged on 27 October 2008) Keith Brown*
